metadata.title: CVE-2022-2505 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Mozilla developers and the Mozilla Fuzzing Team reported memory safety bugs present in Firefox 102. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 102.1, Firefox < 103, and Thunderbird < 102.1.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
